target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select the Options > Preferences menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Options > Preferences menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the tab for the preferences you want to edit:

target.name: Step
target.text: To save your settings and close the Preferences window, click OK.

target.name: Step
target.text: To close the Preferences window without saving, click Cancel.

target.name: FormalPara
target.text: Join by Meeting ID or PIN

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select the Contacts > Manage Contacts and Buddies menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Contacts > Manage Contacts and Buddies menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select one or more contacts from any group under the Community Address Book in the Contact Window (use the CTRL or SHIFT key to select multiple contacts).

target.name: Step
target.text: Right-click on one of the selected contacts and select the Add to Personal Buddies menu item.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: Adding a Non-Community User to Your Personal Buddy List

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select the Contacts > Manage Contacts and Buddies menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Contacts > Manage Contacts and Buddies menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Right-click on the Personal Address Book and select the Add Buddy By Screen Name menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Type the contacts screen name into the dialog and click OK.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Remove a Contact From Your Personal Buddy List:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Find the buddy you want to remove under your Personal Buddy List.

target.name: Step
target.text: Find the buddy you want to remove under your Personal Buddy List.

target.name: Step
target.text: Right-click on the buddy and select the Remove From Personal Buddies menu item.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Search the Community Address Book For a Name:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select the Contacts > Manage Contacts and Buddies... menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Contacts > Manage Contacts and Buddies... menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: At the bottom of the Contact window, click Search...

target.name: Step
target.text: In either the First Name Contains or Last Name Contains fields, type a few characters of the contact's first or last name depending on which field you use.

target.name: Step
target.text: Deselect the name field you are not using.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Delete a Search Results Group:

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Edit a Search Results Group:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Right-click on a search results group and select the Edit Search Criteria menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Right-click on a search results group and select the Edit Search Criteria menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Make your changes to the search criteria in the Find Contacts window, and then click Search Now.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Add a Personal Buddy From the Community Address Book:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select one or more registered users (designated by the PC icon ).

target.name: Step
target.text: Select one or more registered users (designated by the PC icon ).

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Buddies > Add to Personal Buddies menu item.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Add a Personal Buddy by Name:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select the Buddies > Add Buddy by Screen Name menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Buddies > Add Buddy by Screen Name menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Type in the screen name and click OK.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Add a Contact to the Community Address Book (Administrator Only):

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select the Community Address Book, or a group under it.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Community Address Book, or a group under it.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click New and select the New Contact menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the contact information window that appears, fill out the contact's information, and then click OK.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Add a Contact to Your Personal Address Book:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select the Personal address book or any group beneath it (with the exception of the group marked Buddies).

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Personal address book or any group beneath it (with the exception of the group marked Buddies).

target.name: Step
target.text: Click New and select the New Contact menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the contact information window that appears, fill out the contact's information, and then click OK.

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select one or more contacts from any group.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select one or more contacts from any group.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Edit > Copy menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the group into which you want to copy the contacts.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Edit > Paste menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the confirmation dialog that appears, click Yes to delete the contacts.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Add a Group to Your Personal Address Book:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click New and select the New Group menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: When the new screen appears, type in the group name and click OK.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Add a Group to the Community Address Book (Administrators Only):

target.name: Step
target.text: Click New and select the New Group menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: When the new screen appears, type in the group name and click OK.

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select the group you want to delete.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the group you want to delete.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the confirmation dialog box that appears, click Yes to delete the group.

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select the Contacts > Manage Contact and Buddies... menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Contacts > Manage Contact and Buddies... menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Manage Contacts window, select the contact you want to edit.

target.name: Step
target.text: Edit the contacts information (see the descriptions for the fields below).
